Game.Name: 2 Games in 1 - Sonic Battle + Sonic Pinball Party (Europe) (En,Ja,Fr,De,Es,It)
Game.plot: You can play two portable Sonic games in one bundle with Sonic Advance & Sonic Pinball Party Combo Pack. Sonic Advance is a classic Sonic-style 2D platformer. You can play as one of four characters as you collect Chaos Emeralds and try to thwart the evil Eggman. Sonic Pinball Party is a Sonic-themed pinball game with a wealth of minigames and support for link cable multiplayer.Cheat: Go to game start on the main menu, and select Sonic (don't press A, just make sure he is on your screen.) When you do this, do the following: Cheat: up, right, down, right, L, right, R right, A Cheat: You should hear a chime like you just collected a ring letting you know the code was right. Select a course (if you have that option) and have fun. Cheat: Oh, by the way, the computer Tails isn't very smart, but it can be helpful. (He doesn't Die.)Cheat: You must have a GBA, GBA to GCN link cable, two memory card with Chao garden saves, and this game. Send the Chao you want to duplicate to the GBA. It should say it's making a copy. Once you have the copy go to move. Move the duplicated Chao to the Garden in slot two. Now take the Chao out of the garden and put it in slot 1. Now take the other Chao from slot 2 and transfer it to slot 1. You now have two of the same Chao.Cheat: Run up to the first yellow spring in the level (Just as the ground turns to pavement and grass) and jump to the right side of it. Push yourself against it, face right, and do a spin dash. Release to send Sonic/Tails/Knuckles spinning forward, while holding Right on the control pad, and hold it. You'll go through the two loops, but as you go downhill, your character will fly far right and off the screen. Keep holding Right untill the camera catches up with your character.Cheat: During the chao memory game press the A button as your chao moves a card and it'll trip up. This can stop it from moving the card.Cheat: Normally the sound test has 39 songs on it. If you can beat (not just make it to) The Moon Zone, then the Sound Test will Have songs 40 (The Moon Zone), 41 (Sonic has cleared EXTRA), and 42 (Super Sonic Ending).Cheat: If you go into Ring Mode in every zone, after you beat the last zone, you will go into the true last stage with SuperSonic as the Character on the Board.
